attributes.action: give himself and the rest of his ministers a top of the range hearing aid (paid for by the taxpayer of course}
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the people of great britain would benefit from this as non of them can hear the people of great britain

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
